name: The Chicken's Fall
description:
Once Upon a time,
A chicken that dreamed of flying, it tried 30 times... and it fell.

Fall, dodge obstacles and don't die.
The game has 30 stages, 9 skins, relaxing music and good hours of pure fun!

The game features:

  • 30 amazing and minimalist stages

  • 9 different skins

  • Gamepad support

  • Relaxing music (it's not the trailer song)

  • The game can help as an anti-stress

  • Translation into English and Portuguese

  • Good hours of pure fun!
